package EcommerceStore;

public class Product {
	int productID;
	String name;
	int price;
	
	Product() {
		productID = 0;
		name = "Bajaj";
		price = 0;
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	
	Product(int productID,String name,int price){
		this.productID = productID;
		this.name = name;
		this.price = price;
	}

}
class Electronics extends Product{
		int years;
	
		Electronics() {
			super();
			years = 2;
		}
		
		Electronics(int productID,String name,int price, int years) {
			super(productID, name, price);
			this.years = years;
		}
		
		void applyWarranty(String name) {
			System.out.println("The warranty applied for "+name+" is "+years+" years " );
		}
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}
	
class Clothing extends Product{
		double discPer;
		
		Clothing(){
			super();
			discPer = 20;
		}
		
		Clothing(int productID,String name,int price, int discPer){
			super(productID, name, price);
			this.discPer = discPer;			
		}
		
		void applyDiscount(String name) {
			System.out.println("The discounted price of "+name+" is "+(price-(price*(discPer/100)))+" rupees ");
		}
}
